reasoning: Arteriovenous fistula includes heterogeneous subtypes: congenital (rare, <0.1 per 100k), acquired/traumatic (~1-2 per 100k), and dialysis-access related (common in dialysis population but procedural outcome). Global estimate ~2.5 per 100k across all types. Limited population-based incidence data; heterogeneity and varying definitions by location reduce confidence.
